verses.verse: Afterward he brought<WH7725> me again<WH7725> to the door<WH6607> of the house;<WH1004> and, behold,<WH2009> waters<WH4325> issued<WH3318> out from under<WH8478> the threshold<WH4670> of the house<WH1004> eastward:<WH6921> for the forefront<WH6440> of the house<WH1004> stood toward the east,<WH6921> and the waters<WH4325> came<WH3381> down<WH3381> from under<WH8478> from the right<WH3233> side of the house,<WH1004> at the south<WH5045> side of the altar.<WH4196>

Then brought<WH3318> he me out of the way<WH1870> of the gate<WH8179> northward,<WH6828> and led<WH5437> me about<WH5437> the way<WH1870> without<WH2351> to the utter<WH2351> gate<WH8179> by the way<WH1870> that looks<WH6437> eastward;<WH6921> and, behold,<WH2009> there ran<WH6379> out waters<WH4325> on the right<WH3233> side.<WH3802>

And when the man<WH376> that had the line<WH6957> in his hand<WH3027> went<WH3318> forth<WH3318> eastward,<WH6921> he measured<WH4058> a thousand<WH505> cubits,<WH520> and he brought<WH5674> me through<WH5674> the waters;<WH4325> the waters<WH4325> were to the ankles.<WH657>

Again he measured<WH4058> a thousand,<WH505> and brought<WH5674> me through<WH5674> the waters;<WH4325> the waters<WH4325> were to the knees.<WH1290> Again he measured<WH4058> a thousand,<WH505> and brought<WH5674> me through;<WH5674> the waters<WH4325> were to the loins.<WH4975>

Afterward he measured<WH4058> a thousand;<WH505> and it was a river<WH5158> that I could<WH3201> not pass<WH5674> over:<WH5674> for the waters<WH4325> were risen,<WH1342> waters<WH4325> to swim<WH7813> in, a river<WH5158> that could not be passed<WH5674> over.<WH5674>
And he said<WH559> to me, Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> have you seen<WH7200> this? Then he brought<WH3212> me, and caused me to return<WH7725> to the brink<WH8193> of the river.<WH5158>
Now when I had returned,<WH7725> behold,<WH2009> at<WH413> the bank<WH8193> of the river<WH5158> were very<WH3966> many<WH7227> trees<WH6086> on the one side and on the other.<WH2088>

Then said<WH559> he to me, These<WH428> waters<WH4325> issue<WH3318> out toward the east<WH6930> country,<WH1552> and go<WH3381> down<WH3381> into<WH5921> the desert,<WH6160> and go<WH935> into the sea:<WH3220> which being brought<WH3318> forth<WH3318> into the sea,<WH3220> the waters<WH4325> shall be healed.<WH7495>

And it shall come<WH1961> to pass, that every<WH3605> thing<WH5315> that lives,<WH2416> which<WH834> moves,<WH8317> wherever<WH413> <WH3605> <WH834> <WH8033> the rivers<WH5158> shall come,<WH935> shall live:<WH2421> and there shall be a very<WH3966> great<WH7227> multitude of fish,<WH1710> because<WH3588> these<WH428> waters<WH4325> shall come<WH935> thither:<WH8033> for they shall be healed;<WH7495> and every<WH3605> thing shall live<WH2425> where<WH413> the river<WH5158> comes.<WH935>

And it shall come<WH1961> to pass, that the fishers<WH1728> shall stand<WH5975> on it from Engedi<WH5872> even to Eneglaim;<WH5882> they shall be a place to spread<WH4894> forth nets;<WH2764> their fish<WH1710> shall be according to their kinds,<WH4327> as the fish<WH1710> of the great<WH1419> sea,<WH3220> exceeding<WH3966> many.<WH7227>
But the miry<WH1207> places thereof and the marshes<WH1360> thereof shall not be healed;<WH7495> they shall be given<WH5414> to salt.<WH4417>

And by the river<WH5158> on the bank<WH8193> thereof, on this<WH2088> side and on that side, shall grow<WH5927> all<WH3605> trees<WH6086> for meat,<WH3978> whose leaf<WH5929> shall not fade,<WH5034> neither<WH3808> shall the fruit<WH6529> thereof be consumed:<WH8552> it shall bring<WH1069> forth new<WH1069> fruit<WH1061> according to his months,<WH2320> because<WH3588> their waters<WH4325> they issued<WH3318> out of the sanctuary:<WH4720> and the fruit<WH6529> thereof shall be for meat,<WH3978> and the leaf<WH5929> thereof for medicine.<WH8644>

Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> This<WH2088> shall be the border,<WH1366> whereby<WH834> you shall inherit<WH5157> the land<WH776> according to the twelve<WH8147> <WH6240> tribes<WH7626> of Israel:<WH3478> Joseph<WH3130> shall have two portions.<WH2256>

And you shall inherit<WH3423> it, one<WH376> as well as another:<WH251> concerning the which<WH834> I lifted<WH5375> up my hand<WH3027> to give<WH5414> it to your fathers:<WH1> and this<WH2063> land<WH776> shall fall<WH5307> to you for inheritance.<WH5159>

And this<WH2088> shall be the border<WH1366> of the land<WH776> toward the north<WH6828> side,<WH6285> from the great<WH1419> sea,<WH3220> the way<WH1870> of Hethlon,<WH2855> as men go<WH935> to Zedad;<WH6657>

Hamath,<WH2574> Berothah,<WH1268> Sibraim,<WH5453> which<WH834> is between<WH996> the border<WH1366> of Damascus<WH1834> and the border<WH1366> of Hamath;<WH2574> Hazarhatticon,<WH2694> which<WH834> is by the coast<WH1366> of Hauran.<WH2362>

And the border<WH1366> from the sea<WH3220> shall be Hazarenan,<WH2703> the border<WH1366> of Damascus,<WH1834> and the north<WH6828> northward,<WH6828> and the border<WH1366> of Hamath.<WH2574> And this is the north<WH6828> side.<WH6285>

And the east<WH6921> side<WH6285> you shall measure<WH4058> from Hauran,<WH2362> and from Damascus,<WH1834> and from Gilead,<WH1568> and from the land<WH776> of Israel<WH3478> by Jordan,<WH3383> from the border<WH1366> to the east<WH6931> sea.<WH3220> And this is the east<WH6921> side.<WH6285>

And the south<WH5045> side<WH6285> southward,<WH5045> from Tamar<WH8559> even to the waters<WH4325> of strife<WH4808> in Kadesh,<WH6946> the river<WH5158> to the great<WH1419> sea.<WH3220> And this is the south<WH8486> side<WH6285> southward.<WH5045>

The west<WH3220> side<WH6285> also shall be the great<WH1419> sea<WH3220> from the border,<WH1366> till<WH5704> a man come<WH935> over<WH5227> against<WH5704> <WH5227> Hamath.<WH2574> This<WH2063> is the west<WH3220> side.<WH6285>
So shall you divide<WH2505> this<WH2063> land<WH776> to you according to the tribes<WH7626> of Israel.<WH3478>

And it shall come<WH1961> to pass, that you shall divide<WH5307> it by lot for an inheritance<WH5159> to you, and to the strangers<WH1616> that sojourn<WH1481> among<WH8432> you, which<WH834> shall beget<WH3205> children<WH1121> among<WH8432> you: and they shall be to you as born<WH249> in the country<WH249> among the children<WH1121> of Israel;<WH3478> they shall have<WH5307> inheritance<WH5159> with you among<WH8432> the tribes<WH7626> of Israel.<WH3478>

And it shall come<WH1961> to pass, that in what<WH834> tribe<WH7626> the stranger<WH1616> sojournes,<WH1481> there<WH8033> shall you give<WH5414> him his inheritance,<WH5159> said<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD.<WH3069>
